activity.instructions: Read about the people. Click on the correct response.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.reader: Maggie Gyllenhaal is an actress. She has brown hair and blue eyes. Her brother, Jake, is an actor too. He is tall with straight black hair and greenish blue eyes. They are from the U.S. Diego Torres is a singer from Argentina. He is very handsome, with blue eyes. His hair is wavy and blonde. Sometimes he has a moustache, sometimes a beard, and sometimes both. His mother, Lolita, was a singer too. Tony Leung is an actor from Hong Kong. He has straight black hair and brown eyes. He is not very tall. In addition to Chinese, he speaks English, Spanish, and Japanese. He has one sister, but she is not an actress. Franco De Vita is a singer from Venezuela, but he lived in Italy from the ages of 3 to 13. He isn’t young, but his hair is still brown—only a little gray. Halle Berry is a very beautiful actress from the U.S. Ms. Berry has long brown hair and pretty brown eyes. She is not very tall.
